This plan also gives you 411 directory assistance at an affordable price. You also don't pay exra fees for long distance calls. A review of PlatinumTel Wireless

I used a very popular cell phone service for six years but since I lost my previous job and landed another one that pays less than my other job, so I needed to switch phone carriers as I was finding it difficult to pay rent and a high phone bill. So I now use Platinumtel Wireless and it's pleasant to use. I'm currently using the Paygo plan, which allows me to pay as I go, and it costs far less than the cell phone service I used for several years. Since I don't use text messaging often, I only have a limited amount of data for this purpose, and I can still talk unlimited on weekends and still pay an affordable price for my service each month. I like he fact that there are no hidden fees, and it's easy for me to access a customer service representative when I have questions about my service. Another thing I like about PlatinumTel Wireless is that I don't have too many pronlems with roaming or my phone calls dropping while I'm talking to people inside buildings. I would recommend this company to parents who want to get an affordable cell phone service for their kids, and this is also a good idea for people who don't have families What I liked about this service is that you can choose from a variety of phones from brands such as LG, Nokia, Samsung, Sony and other good brands. Customers should consider this service.
